item.description:
People of New England!

On September 24, on the streets of Boston, join a worldwide event - Moving Planet - calling our elected leaders, businesses and communities to get serious about moving beyond fossil fuels. Come on bike or on foot, by boat, carpool or public transportation! Come with your community, your organization, or simply yourself to help make one big, bold, beautiful statement:

We have the power to build a secure, healthy, just and sustainable future for our children and our planet!

Local Moving Planet events are being planned in Beverly, Salem, Somerville, Newburyport, Wayland and other communities around Massachusetts with participants moving into Boston for the afternoon rally at Christopher Columbus Park. 1500 expected!

Visit the Moving Planet: New England website for more details.

group.name: The Boston Green Business Networking Group

item.name: Let's Get Moving Beyond Fossil Fuels - Join Us At The Moving Planet Event
